7C0803A6 38210010

It forces a random damage animation to occur at will.

Support Status:
 + Battle (Offline)
 + Battle (Online)
 + Grand Prix
 - Menu
 + VS Race (Offline)
 + VS Race (Online)
 + Time Trials
 - Wii Remote
 - Wii Remote + Nunchuck
 - Wii U Classic Controller
 + Wii U GamePad

How to use:
-

Activator(s):

[Wii U GamePad]
Enable: Flick Up
